definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: "The work station should fit your body like a comfortable pair of shoes, " Young said.
sentences.chinese: 工作間對你的身體來說應該像一雙合腳的鞋子。

sentences.english: From the back of the shoe, from the name to the tongue everything is connected.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子的後面，從牌子到鞋舌都是連在一起的。

sentences.english: Throwing shoes at somebody is a supreme insult in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 在中東地區，向人扔鞋子是對人最嚴重的侮辱。

sentences.english: He had on a brand-new pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着一雙簇新的鞋子。

sentences.english: They are quite worn out. Marmee must have a new pair.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子太破舊了，媽咪得換雙新的。

sentences.english: The black stitching around the toe box gives the shoe a good punch.
sentences.chinese: 黑縫在腳趾箱子附近給鞋子好拳打。

sentences.english: Hundreds of boxes of shoes. A mannequin.
sentences.chinese: 醫院病牀，幾百盒鞋子，人體模特。

sentences.english: The main body sex of dress and integral sex decided the appurtenant position of shoe.
sentences.chinese: 服裝的主體性和整體性決定了鞋子的從屬地位。

sentences.english: B: No, but if they are defective, you can exchange them for another pair.
sentences.chinese: 不行，但要是鞋子有瑕疵，你可以換另一雙。

sentences.english: Candle shadow inside, sees yarn debt droop, before the bed one big one small two pairs of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 燭影裏，只見紗帳低垂，牀前一大一小兩對鞋子。

sentences.english: The shoe boxwill generally state what activity the shoe is designed for.
sentences.chinese: 通常，鞋盒上會說明這種鞋子爲哪種運動而設計。

sentences.english: Extend the life of shoes by repairing the  soles.
sentences.chinese: 釘鞋掌還能延長鞋子的壽命。

sentences.english: We have every size of shoes in stock.
sentences.chinese: 本店備有各種尺寸鞋子的現貨。

sentences.english: But everyone can tell cheap or poorly cared-for shoes.
sentences.chinese: 但是每個人都能看出廉價或者不常打理的鞋子來。

sentences.english: Comfy slip-on type shoes equals a happy traveler.
sentences.chinese: 寬鬆舒適的鞋子可以成就一個快樂的旅行者。

sentences.english: You'll need to take your shoes to the cobblers to have them mended.
sentences.chinese: 你得把鞋子拿到補鞋匠那裏修一下。

definition: bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
